markdownRemark.html: description: Golf Nuevo Portil - This 18-hole golf course is set 18 kms from Huelva in the middle of a beautiful pine forest. It is a good golf course, well preserved, with an interesting variety of holes, defined by bunkers, water and trees placed in strategically closed curves. It does not pretend to be a Champioship field, which is sincere. The fairways are good and wide and the greens are real, but not too fast.

frontmatter.title: Golf Nuevo Portil
frontmatter.description: Golf Nuevo Portil -  This 18-hole golf course is set 18 kms from Huelva in the middle of a beautiful pine forest. It is a good golf course, well preserved, with an interesting variety of holes, defined by bunkers, water and trees placed in strategically closed curves. It does not pretend to be a Champioship field, which is sincere. The fairways are good and wide and the greens are real, but not too fast.
frontmatter.address: Diego de Almagro, 2, Urb.Nuevo Portil, 21459 Cartaya, Huelva, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 55.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 55.00 euros
